text: The 1959 NCAA Golf Championship was the 21st annual NCAA-sanctioned golf tournament to determine the individual and team national champions of men's collegiate golf in the United States. The tournament was held at Eugene Country Club in Eugene, Oregon, hosted by the University of Oregon. Three-time defending champions Houston won the team title, the Cougars' fourth NCAA team national title. ==Individual results== ===Individual champion=== * Dick Crawford, Houston ===Tournament medalists=== * Bob Pratt, Houston (136) * Jack Cupit, Houston (136) ==Team results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" ! dat-sort-type=number|Rank !!
